dependencyDescriptions.fluent-ffmpeg: Wrapper around ffmpeg, for converting multimedia files.
dependencyDescriptions.form-data: A module to create readable "multipart/form-data" streams. Can be used to submit forms and file uploads to other web applications.
dependencyDescriptions.node-fetch: A light-weight module that brings window.fetch to Node.js. Used to send form-data to the server.
dependencyDescriptions.react: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
dependencyDescriptions.react-dom: React package for working with the DOM.
dependencyDescriptions.react-dropzone: Simple HTML5 drag-drop zone with React.js. Used to create a drag and drop file upload component.
dependencyDescriptions.recoil: Recoil is an state management library for React apps.
dependencyDescriptions.uuid: Simple, fast generation of RFC4122 UUIDS.

devDependencyDescriptions.eslint: A fully pluggable tool for identifying and reporting on patterns in JavaScript.
devDependencyDescriptions.eslint-plugin-import: This plugin intends to support linting of ES2015+ (ES6+) import/export syntax, and prevent issues with misspelling of file paths and import names. Used to sort imports alphabetically.
devDependencyDescriptions.typescript: TypeScript is a language for application scale JavaScript development.
